mapper.select: SELECT * FROM fee_rules ORDER BY rule_id DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fee_rules(base_price, free_minutes, daily_cap) VALUES(#{basePrice}, #{freeMinutes}, #{dailyCap})
